name: Beneath The Waves (zombiewarrior07)
description:
Beneath The Waves is my entry in the Tally-Ho Corner Escape & Evasion Game Jam, details here:   Escape & Evasion Game Jam

In this game, you control a Uboat, and your primary objective is to survive by evading enemy attacks. Your secondary objective is to sink the maximum tonnage of enemy convoy ships.

Beneath The Waves is a simple, top-down, 2D game, controlled with keyboard and mouse.
